price: (नूह़ ने) कहा : मूझे क्या मालूम कि वे क्या कर्म करते रहे हैं?
arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلۡمِي بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: qāla wamā ʿil'mī bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
